name: Centiva Capital
overview:
Centiva Capital Inc. is a Canadian-based investment company that develops and manages investments in early-stage businesses with high growth potential, and maintains a portfolio of marketable securities. The Company currently has three investees.

Centiva was formed in October 2007 to hold the assets and liabilities of TriNorth Capital Inc. following a reorganization under which TriNorth changed its business strategy and raised new capital.

Centiva has a diversified investment portfolio through its investments in marketable securities and venture investments in early-stage companies with high growth potential, and its Grapevine Solutions , business, which is a division of the Company. Centiva has a 14% equity interest in VFM Leonardo

offices.address1: Suite 3800, Royal Bank Plaza, South Tower, 200 Bay Street, P.O. Box 84

funding_round.source_description: VFM Interactive Inc. Completes $13.5 Million Financing
